gear.Name: Boltstorm guantlet
gear.Ability: If a model is making a close combat attack with a boltstorm guantlet, you must subtract 1 from the hit roll.

gear.Name: Plasma incinerator
gear.Ability: Each time a model fires a plasma incinerator, it can supercharge the weapon before firing. If it does so, increase the Strength and Damage of the weapon by 1 this turn. If you roll any hit rolls of 1 when firing a supercharged plasma incinerator, the firing model is slain as the weapon explodes.

gear.Name: Plaguespitter
gear.Ability: You can re-roll any wound rolls of 1 when attacking with a plague weapon. In addition, a plaguespitter automatically hits its target - there is no need to make hit rolls.

gear.Name: Plague probe
gear.Ability: You can re-roll any wound rolls of 1 when attacking with a plague weapon.

gear.Name: Plaguereaper
gear.Ability: You can re-roll any wound rolls of 1 when attacking with a plague weapon.

gear.Name: Blight grenade
gear.Ability: You can re-roll any wound rolls of 1 when attacking with a plague weapon.

gear.Name: Plasma pistol
gear.Ability: Each time a model fires a plasma pistol, it can supercharge the weapon before firing. If it does so, increase the Strength and Damage of the weapon by 1 this turn. If you roll any hit rolls of 1 when firing a supercharged plasma pistol, the firing model is slain as the weapon explodes.

gear.Name: Cursed plague bell
gear.Ability: You can re-roll any wound rolls of 1 when attacking with a plague weapon.

gear.Name: Plaguesword
gear.Ability: You can re-roll any wound rolls of 1 when attacking with a plague weapon. You can also re-roll all failed wound rolls when resolving attacks with this weapon.

gear.Name: Power fist
gear.Ability: If a model is attacking with a power fist, you must subtract 1 from the hit roll

gear.Name: Plasma gun
gear.Ability: Each time a model fires a plasma gun, it can supercharge the weapon before firing. If it does so, increase the Strength and Damage of the weapon by 1 this turn. If you roll any hit rolls of 1 when firing a supercharged plasma gun, the firing model is slain as the weapon explodes.

gear.Name: Plague knife
gear.Ability: You can re-roll any wound rolls of 1 when attacking with a plague weapon.
